Smart Mirror: Integrate a touchscreen display into the mirror, allowing users to access their calendars, weather updates, and other useful information without having to look away.
Interactive Mirror: Add motion sensors to the mirror, so it can respond to movement and create a more immersive experience when using it for makeup application or hair styling.
Mirror with built-in lighting: Add LED lights to the mirror to improve the quality of the reflection and make it easier to see the details of one's appearance.
Mirror with a built-in camera: Add a camera to the mirror, allowing users to take photos or record videos without having to use a separate device.
Mirror with a built-in magnifying lens: Add a magnifying lens to the mirror, allowing users to see small details of their appearance more clearly.
